mapper.select: SELECT u.u_id,u_name,u_sex,u_birth,u_joindate,u_img,d.d_id,d_name,group_concat(b.post_id) post_id,group_concat(b.post_name) post_name FROM user_position a left join position b ON a.post_id = b.post_id left join user u on a.u_id = u.u_id left join department d on u.d_id = d.d_id where u.u_status=1 group by u.u_id asc

SELECT u.u_id,u_name,u_sex,u_birth,u_joindate,u_img,d.d_id,d_name,group_concat(b.post_id) post_id,group_concat(b.post_name) post_name FROM user_position a left join position b ON a.post_id = b.post_id left join user u on a.u_id = u.u_id left join department d on u.d_id = d.d_id where u.u_status=1 and u.u_name like CONCAT('%',#{uname},'%') group by u.u_id asc
